channel.title: Iproute2 on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Iproute2 on TLDRBins

item.title: IP Routing
item.description: Linux Windows Check Routes ip route show Add Route sudo ip route add <SUBNET> via <GATEWAY> dev <INTERFACE> sudo ip route add 172.16.0.0/16 via 192.168.1.10 dev eth0 Modify Route sudo ip route replace <SUBNET> via <GATEWAY> dev <INTERFACE> sudo ip route replace 172.16.0.0/16 via 192.168.1.20 dev eth0 Delete Route sudo ip route del <SUBNET> sudo ip route del 172.16.0.0/16 # Exact match sudo ip route del <SUBNET> via <GATEWAY> dev <INTERFACE> sudo ip route del 172.
